alert.note: Alert for Howard (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 10 at 7:14PM CDT until June 10 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall has been reported. * WHERE...A portion of central Nebraska, including the following county, Howard. * WHEN...Until 1015 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 709 PM CDT, radar estimates that 1 to 2 inches fell over the advisory area from strong thunderstorms that moved through the area. County dispatchers reported minor flooding occurring over a rural road northeast of Elba. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Elba and Farwell and rural areas near those towns. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
